name: IdleSpace
description:
Make your way through dense asteroid fields and countless waves of enemies
Defeat bosses and emerge victorious from fierce encounters!
Don't forget to smash that fullscreen button :)

Featuring autosave and offline progress will allow you to play even when you sleep!

Bonus multiplier has been temporally increased to x15 for testing purposes :) GL!

Please leave a comment, as this is a work in progress!

quick instruction:
click + icon
select first block
select the placed block
select a cannon to fit on top of it :)

swipe the screen or use mouse wheel to move around
